TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit DynamicObject extends System.Object implements class System.Dynamic.IDynamicMetaObjectProvider

summary.span: 提供用于在运行时指定动态行为的基类。

span.span: Provides a base class for specifying dynamic behavior at run time.

summary.span: 必须继承此类；不能直接对其进行实例化。

span.span: This class must be inherited from; you cannot instantiate it directly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `DynamicObject`类使你能够定义可以对动态对象执行哪些操作以及如何执行这些操作。The `DynamicObject` class enables you to define which operations can be performed on dynamic objects and how to perform those operations. 例如，你可以定义当你尝试获取或设置对象属性、 调用方法，或执行如加法和乘法的标准数学运算时，会发生什么情况。For example, you can define what happens when you try to get or set an object property, call a method, or perform standard mathematical operations such as addition and multiplication. 此类可以是你想要创建用于库的更方便协议的情况下很有用。This class can be useful if you want to create a more convenient protocol for a library. 例如，如果你的库的用户必须使用类似的语法`Scriptobj.SetProperty("Count", 1)`，你可以提供的功能，使用更简单的语法，如`scriptobj.Count = 1`。For example, if users of your library have to use syntax like `Scriptobj.SetProperty("Count", 1)`, you can provide the ability to use much simpler syntax, like `scriptobj.Count = 1`. 你无法直接创建的实例`DynamicObject`类。You cannot directly create an instance of the `DynamicObject` class. 若要实现的动态行为，你可能想要从其继承`DynamicObject`类并重写所需的方法。To implement the dynamic behavior, you may want to inherit from the `DynamicObject` class and override necessary methods. 例如，如果你需要的设置和获取属性的唯一操作，您可以只覆盖和方法。For example, if you need only operations for setting and getting properties, you can override just the and methods. 在 C# 中，若要启用动态行为的类的实例派生自`DynamicObject`类，你必须使用`dynamic`关键字。In C#, to enable dynamic behavior for instances of classes derived from the `DynamicObject` class, you must use the `dynamic` keyword. 有关更多信息，请参见[使用类型 dynamic](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/types/using-type-dynamic.md)。For more information, see [Using Type dynamic](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/types/using-type-dynamic.md). 在 Visual Basic，后期绑定支持动态操作。In Visual Basic, dynamic operations are supported by late binding. 有关详细信息，请参阅[早期绑定和后期绑定](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ff7f1e-b94f-4205-ab8d-5cfa91758724)。For more information, see [Early and Late Binding](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ff7f1e-b94f-4205-ab8d-5cfa91758724). 下面的代码示例演示如何创建派生自的类的实例`DynamicObject`类。The following code example demonstrates how to create an instance of a class that is derived from the `DynamicObject` class. ```csharp public class SampleDynamicObject : DynamicObject {} //... dynamic sampleObject = new SampleDynamicObject (); ``` ```vb Public Class SampleDynamicObject Inherits DynamicObject '... Dim sampleObject As Object = New SampleDynamicObject() ``` 此外可以向派生自的类添加你自己的成员`DynamicObject`类。You can also add your own members to classes derived from the `DynamicObject` class. 如果您的类定义属性，而且还将重写方法，动态语言运行时 (DLR) 第一次使用语言联编程序来查找有关静态的类中的属性定义。If your class defines properties and also overrides the method, the dynamic language runtime (DLR) first uses the language binder to look for a static definition of a property in the class. 如果没有这样的属性，DLR 调用方法。If there is no such property, the DLR calls the method. `DynamicObject`类可实现 DLR 接口，从而使你可以共享的实例`DynamicObject`支持 DLR 互操作性模型的语言之间的类。The `DynamicObject` class implements the DLR interface , which enables you to share instances of the `DynamicObject` class between languages that support the DLR interoperability model. 例如，可以创建的实例`DynamicObject`类在 C# 中，并将其传递给 IronPython 函数。For example, you can create an instance of the `DynamicObject` class in C# and then pass it to an IronPython function. 有关详细信息，请参阅[动态语言运行时概述](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/dynamic-language-runtime-overview.md)。For more information, see [Dynamic Language Runtime Overview](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/dynamic-language-runtime-overview.md). > [!NOTE] > 如果你有一个简单的方案中，您需要的对象，但仅可以添加和删除成员在运行时，不需要定义特定操作和不具有静态成员，可使用类。If you have a simple scenario in which you need an object that can only add and remove members at run time but that does not need to define specific operations and does not have static members, use the class. > > 如果你有更高级的方案，你需要在其中定义动态参与互操作性协议，或者你需要管理 DLR 快速动态调度缓存的对象，创建您自己的实现接口。If you have a more advanced scenario in which you need to define how dynamic objects participate in the interoperability protocol, or you need to manage DLR fast dynamic dispatch caching, create your own implementation of the interface. ## Examples 假设你想要提供替代语法访问值在字典中，编写的因此`sampleDictionary["Text"] = "Sample text"`(`sampleDictionary("Text") = "Sample text"`在 Visual Basic 中)，你可以编写`sampleDictionary.Text = "Sample text"`。Assume that you want to provide alternative syntax for accessing values in a dictionary, so that instead of writing `sampleDictionary["Text"] = "Sample text"` (`sampleDictionary("Text") = "Sample text"` in Visual Basic), you can write `sampleDictionary.Text = "Sample text"`. 此外，你想要不区分大小写，此语法，以便`sampleDictionary.Text`等效于`sampleDictionary.text`。Also, you want this syntax to be case-insensitive, so that `sampleDictionary.Text` is equivalent to `sampleDictionary.text`. 下面的代码示例演示`DynamicDictionary`类，该类派生自`DynamicObject`类。The following code example demonstrates the `DynamicDictionary` class, which is derived from the `DynamicObject` class. `DynamicDictionary`类包含的对象`Dictionary`类型 (`Dictionary(Of String, Object)`在 Visual Basic 中) 来存储键 / 值对，并重写和方法，以支持新的语法。The `DynamicDictionary` class contains an object of the `Dictionary` type (`Dictionary(Of String, Object)` in Visual Basic) to store the key-value pairs, and overrides the and methods to support the new syntax. 它还提供了`Count`属性，用于显示多少动态属性字典包含。It also provides a `Count` property, which shows how many dynamic properties the dictionary contains. [!code-csharp[System.Dynamic.DynamicObject#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.dynamic.dynamicobject/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Dynamic.DynamicObject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.dynamic.dynamicobject/vb/module1.vb#1)] 有关更多示例，请参阅[DynamicObject 与创建包装](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=169008)C# 常见问题博客上。For more examples, see [Creating Wrappers with DynamicObject](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=169008) on the C# Frequently Asked Questions blog.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类派生自类可以重写此方法以指定应如何对动态对象执行二元运算。Classes derived from the class can override this method to specify how binary operations should be performed for a dynamic object. 如果该方法没有覆盖，语言运行时联编程序确定的行为。When the method is not overridden, the run-time binder of the language determines the behavior. （大多数情况下，将引发语言特定的运行时异常。）(In most cases, a language-specific run-time exception is thrown.) 当您使用例如加法或乘法的二元运算时，调用此方法。This method is called when you have binary operations such as addition or multiplication. 例如，如果方法被重写，它将自动调用语句等`sum = first + second`或`multiply = first*second`，其中`first`派生自`DynamicObject`类。For example, if the method is overridden, it is automatically invoked for statements like `sum = first + second` or `multiply = first*second`, where `first` is derived from the `DynamicObject` class. 可以使用来获取有关类型的二元运算信息`Operation`属性`binder`参数。You can get information about the type of the binary operation by using the `Operation` property of the `binder` parameter. 如果仅在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中使用动态对象`binder.Operation`属性可以具有中的以下值之一枚举。If your dynamic object is used only in C# and Visual Basic, the `binder.Operation` property can have one of the following values from the enumeration. 但是，在 IronPython 或 IronRuby 等其他语言，可以有其他值。However, in other languages such as IronPython or IronRuby, you can have other values. |“值”Value|描述Description|C#C#|Visual BasicVisual Basic| |-----------|-----------------|---------|------------------| |`Add`|不针对数值操作数溢出检查的加法运算。An addition operation without overflow checking, for numeric operands.|`a + b`|`a + b`| |`AddAssign`|不进行溢出检查，针对数值操作数加法复合赋值运算。An addition compound assignment operation without overflow checking, for numeric operands.|`a += b`|不支持。Not supported.| |`And`|按位`AND`操作。A bitwise `AND` operation.|`a & b`|`a And b`| |`AndAssign`|按位`AND`复合赋值运算。A bitwise `AND` compound assignment operation.|`a &= b`|不支持。Not supported.| |`Divide`|算术除法运算。An arithmetic division operation.|`a / b`|`a / b`| |`DivideAssign`|除的算术复合赋值运算。An arithmetic division compound assignment operation.|`a /= b`|不支持。Not supported.| |`ExclusiveOr`|按位`XOR`操作。A bitwise `XOR` operation.|`a ^ b`|`a Xor b`| |`ExclusiveOrAssign`|按位`XOR`复合赋值运算。A bitwise `XOR` compound assignment operation.|`a ^= b`|不支持。Not supported.| |`GreaterThan`|"大于"的比较。A "greater than" comparison.|`a > b`|`a > b`| |`GreaterThanOrEqual`|"大于或等于"比较。A "greater than or equal to" comparison.|`a >= b`|不支持。Not supported.| |`LeftShift`|按位左移运算。A bitwise left-shift operation.|`a << b`|`a << b`| |`LeftShiftAssign`|按位左移复合赋值操作。A bitwise left-shift compound assignment operation.|`a <<= b`|不支持。Not supported.| |`LessThan`|"小于"比较。A "less than" comparison.|`a < b`|`a < b`| |`LessThanOrEqual`|"小于或等于"比较。A "less than or equal to" comparison.|`a <= b`|不支持。Not supported.| |`Modulo`|算术余数运算。An arithmetic remainder operation.|`a % b`|`a Mod b`| |`ModuloAssign`|算术余数复合赋值运算。An arithmetic remainder compound assignment operation.|`a %= b`|不支持。Not supported.| |`Multiply`|不进行溢出检查，针对数值操作数乘法运算。A multiplication operation without overflow checking, for numeric operands.|`a * b`|`a * b`| |`MultiplyAssign`|不进行溢出检查，针对数值操作数的乘法复合赋值运算。A multiplication compound assignment operation without overflow checking, for numeric operands.|`a *= b`|不支持。Not supported.| |`NotEqual`|不是相等比较。An inequality comparison.|`a != b`|`a <> b`| |`Or`|按位或逻辑`OR`操作。A bitwise or logical `OR` operation.|`a | b`|`a Or b`| |`OrAssign`|按位或逻辑`OR`复合赋值。A bitwise or logical `OR` compound assignment.|`a |= b`|不支持。Not supported.| |`Power`|对数进行幂运算的数学运算。A mathematical operation of raising a number to a power.|不支持。Not supported.|`a ^ b`| |`RightShift`|按位右移运算。A bitwise right-shift operation.|`a >> b`|`a >> b`| |`RightShiftAssign`|按位右移复合赋值操作。A bitwise right-shift compound assignment operation.|`a >>= b`|不支持。Not supported.| |`Subtract`|不进行溢出检查，针对数值操作数的减法运算。A subtraction operation without overflow checking, for numeric operands.|`a - b`|`a - b`| |`SubtractAssign`|不进行溢出检查，针对数值操作数的减法复合赋值运算。A subtraction compound assignment operation without overflow checking, for numeric operands.|`a -= b`|不支持。Not supported.| > [!NOTE] > 若要实现`OrElse`(`a || b`) 和`AndAlso`(`a && b`) 的 C# 中的动态对象操作来说，你可能想要实现方法和方法。To implement `OrElse` (`a || b`) and `AndAlso` (`a && b`) operations for dynamic objects in C#, you may want to implement both the method and the method. > > `OrElse`操作包含一元`IsTrue`操作和二进制`Or`操作。The `OrElse` operation consists of the unary `IsTrue` operation and the binary `Or` operation. `Or`仅当执行操作的结果`IsTrue`操作`false`。The `Or` operation is performed only if the result of the `IsTrue` operation is `false`. > > `AndAlso`操作包含一元`IsFalse`操作和二进制`And`操作。The `AndAlso` operation consists of the unary `IsFalse` operation and the binary `And` operation. `And`仅当执行操作的结果`IsFalse`操作`false`。The `And` operation is performed only if the result of the `IsFalse` operation is `false`. ## Examples 假定您需要数据结构，用于存储文本和数值表示形式的数字，并且你想要定义基本的数学运算，如加法和减法为此类数据。Assume that you need a data structure to store textual and numeric representations of numbers, and you want to define basic mathematical operations such as addition and subtraction for such data. 下面的代码示例演示`DynamicNumber`类，该类派生自类。The following code example demonstrates the `DynamicNumber` class, which is derived from the class. `DynamicNumber` 重写方法，以使数学运算。`DynamicNumber` overrides the method to enable mathematical operations. 它还将重写和使对元素的访问的方法。It also overrides the and methods to enable access to the elements. 在此示例中，支持仅加法和减法运算。In this example, only addition and subtraction operations are supported. 如果尝试编写类似的语句`resultNumber = firstNumber*secondNumber`，会引发一个运行时异常。If you try to write a statement like `resultNumber = firstNumber*secondNumber`, a run-time exception is thrown. remarks.format: ## Remarks 类派生自类可以重写此方法以指定应如何执行类型转换为动态对象。Classes derived from the class can override this method to specify how a type conversion should be performed for a dynamic object. 如果该方法没有覆盖，语言运行时联编程序确定的行为。When the method is not overridden, the run-time binder of the language determines the behavior. （大多数情况下，将引发语言特定的运行时异常。）(In most cases, a language-specific run-time exception is thrown.) 在 C# 中，如果重写此方法，它被自动调用时必须显式或隐式转换，如下面的代码示例中所示。In C#, if this method is overridden, it is automatically invoked when you have an explicit or implicit conversion, as shown in the code example below. 在 Visual Basic 中，支持仅显式转换。In Visual Basic, only explicit conversion is supported. 如果你重写此方法，则调用它通过使用或函数。If you override this method, you call it by using the or functions. ```csharp // Explicit conversion. String sampleExplicit = (String)sampleObject; // Implicit conversion. String sampleImplicit = sampleObject; ``` ```vb // Explicit conversion - first variant. Dim testExplicit1 = CTypeDynamic(Of String)(sampleObject) // Explicit conversion - second variant. Dim testExplicit2 = CTypeDynamic(sampleObject, GetType(String)) ``` ## Examples 假定您需要数据结构，用于存储文本和数值表示形式的数字，并且你想要定义的此数据结构转换的字符串和整数。Assume that you need a data structure to store textual and numeric representations of numbers, and you want to define conversions of this data structure to strings and integers. 下面的代码示例演示`DynamicNumber`类，该类派生自类。The following code example demonstrates the `DynamicNumber` class, which is derived from the class. `DynamicNumber` 重写方法，以使类型转换。`DynamicNumber` overrides the method to enable type conversion. 它还将重写和方法以允许对数据元素的访问。It also overrides the and methods to enable access to the data elements. 在此示例中，支持仅转换为字符串和整数。In this example, only conversion to strings and integers is supported. 如果你尝试将对象转换为任何其他类型，则会引发一个运行时异常。If you try to convert an object to any other type, a run-time exception is thrown. remarks.format: ## Remarks 类派生自类可以重写此方法以指定如何按索引获取的值应为执行的动态对象。Classes derived from the class can override this method to specify how getting a value by index should be performed for a dynamic object. 如果该方法没有覆盖，语言运行时联编程序确定的行为。When the method is not overridden, the run-time binder of the language determines the behavior. （大多数情况下，将引发运行时异常。）(In most cases, a run-time exception is thrown.) 如果重写此方法，它将自动调用时具有类似的操作`sampleObject[3]`在 C# 或`sampleObject(3)`Visual Basic、 where`sampleObject`派生自类。If this method is overridden, it is automatically invoked when you have an operation like `sampleObject[3]` in C# or `sampleObject(3)` in Visual Basic, where `sampleObject` is derived from the class. ## Examples 假设你想要创建的对象属性可以访问通过名称如`Property0`， `Property1`，依此类推，或索引，以便，例如，`sampleObject.Property0`等效于`sampleObject[0]`在 C# 或`sampleObject(0)`在 Visual Basic 中。Assume that you want to create an object in which properties can be accessed either by names such as `Property0`, `Property1`, and so on, or by index, so that, for example, `sampleObject.Property0` is equivalent to `sampleObject[0]` in C# or `sampleObject(0)` in Visual Basic. 下面的代码示例演示`SampleDynamicObject`类，该类派生自类。The following code example demonstrates the `SampleDynamicObject` class, which is derived from the class. `SampleDynamicObject`类包含的对象`Dictionary`类型 (`Dictionary(Of String, Object)`在 Visual Basic 中) 来存储键 / 值对。The `SampleDynamicObject` class contains an object of the `Dictionary` type (`Dictionary(Of String, Object)` in Visual Basic) to store the key-value pairs. `SampleDynamicObject` 重写和方法以按索引允许访问。`SampleDynamicObject` overrides the and methods to enable access by index. 它将重写和方法以按属性名称中允许访问。It overrides the and methods to enable access by property name. remarks.format: ## Remarks 类派生自类可以重写此方法以指定应如何对动态对象执行操作用于获取的成员值。Classes derived from the class can override this method to specify how operations that get member values should be performed for a dynamic object. 如果该方法没有覆盖，语言运行时联编程序确定的行为。When the method is not overridden, the run-time binder of the language determines the behavior. （大多数情况下，将引发运行时异常。）(In most cases, a run-time exception is thrown.) 当你有这样的语句时调用此方法`Console.WriteLine(sampleObject.SampleProperty)`，其中`sampleObject`是派生自的类的实例类。This method is called when you have statements like `Console.WriteLine(sampleObject.SampleProperty)`, where `sampleObject` is an instance of the class derived from the class. 此外可以向派生自的类添加你自己的成员`DynamicObject`类。You can also add your own members to classes derived from the `DynamicObject` class. 如果您的类定义属性，而且还将重写方法，动态语言运行时 (DLR) 第一次使用语言联编程序来查找有关静态的类中的属性定义。If your class defines properties and also overrides the method, the dynamic language runtime (DLR) first uses the language binder to look for a static definition of a property in the class. 如果没有这样的属性，DLR 调用方法。If there is no such property, the DLR calls the method. ## Examples 假设你想要提供替代语法访问值在字典中，编写的因此`sampleDictionary["Text"] = "Sample text"`(`sampleDictionary("Text") = "Sample text"`在 Visual Basic 中)，你可以编写`sampleDictionary.Text = "Sample text"`。Assume that you want to provide alternative syntax for accessing values in a dictionary, so that instead of writing `sampleDictionary["Text"] = "Sample text"` (`sampleDictionary("Text") = "Sample text"` in Visual Basic), you can write `sampleDictionary.Text = "Sample text"`. 此外，此语法必须不区分大小写，以便`sampleDictionary.Text`等效于`sampleDictionary.text`。Also, this syntax must be case-insensitive, so that `sampleDictionary.Text` is equivalent to `sampleDictionary.text`. 下面的代码示例演示`DynamicDictionary`类，该类派生自类。The following code example demonstrates the `DynamicDictionary` class, which is derived from the class. `DynamicDictionary`类包含的对象`Dictionary`类型 (`Dictionary(Of String, Object)`在 Visual Basic 中) 来存储键 / 值对，并重写和方法，以支持新的语法。The `DynamicDictionary` class contains an object of the `Dictionary` type (`Dictionary(Of String, Object)` in Visual Basic) to store the key-value pairs, and overrides the and methods to support the new syntax. 它还提供了`Count`属性，用于显示多少动态属性字典包含。It also provides a `Count` property, which shows how many dynamic properties the dictionary contains. remarks.format: ## Remarks 类派生自类可以重写此方法以指定应如何对动态对象执行操作，以调用对象成员。Classes derived from the class can override this method to specify how operations that invoke an object member should be performed for a dynamic object. 如果该方法没有覆盖，语言运行时联编程序确定的行为。When the method is not overridden, the run-time binder of the language determines the behavior. （大多数情况下，将引发语言特定的运行时异常。）(In most cases, a language-specific run-time exception is thrown.) 如果重写此方法，它将自动调用时执行类似操作`sampleObject.SampleMethod(100)`，其中`sampleObject`派生自`DynamicObject`类。If this method is overridden, it is automatically invoked when you perform an operation like `sampleObject.SampleMethod(100)`, where `sampleObject` is derived from the `DynamicObject` class. 此外可以向派生自的类添加你自己的方法类。You can also add your own methods to classes that are derived from the class. 例如，如果你重写方法，动态调度系统首先会尝试确定类中是否存在指定的方法。For example, if you override the method, the dynamic dispatch system first attempts to determine whether the specified method exists in the class. 如果找不到该方法，它将使用实现。If it does not find the method, it uses the implementation. 此方法不支持`ref`和`out`参数。This method does not support `ref` and `out` parameters. 中的所有参数`args`数组通过值传递。All parameters in the `args` array are passed by value. ## Examples 假设你想要提供替代语法访问值在字典中，编写的因此`sampleDictionary["Text"] = "Sample text"`(`sampleDictionary("Text") = "Sample text"`在 Visual Basic 中)，你可以编写`sampleDictionary.Text = "Sample text"`。Assume that you want to provide alternative syntax for accessing values in a dictionary, so that instead of writing `sampleDictionary["Text"] = "Sample text"` (`sampleDictionary("Text") = "Sample text"` in Visual Basic), you can write `sampleDictionary.Text = "Sample text"`. 此外，你想要能够对此字典调用所有标准字典方法。Also, you want to be able to call all the standard dictionary methods on this dictionary. 下面的代码示例演示`DynamicDictionary`类，该类派生自类。The following code example demonstrates the `DynamicDictionary` class, which is derived from the class. `DynamicDictionary`类包含的对象`Dictionary`类型 (`Dictionary(Of String, Object)`在 Visual Basic 中) 来存储键 / 值对。The `DynamicDictionary` class contains an object of the `Dictionary` type (`Dictionary(Of String, Object)` in Visual Basic) to store the key-value pairs. 它将重写方法，以支持的方法类，并重写和方法，以支持新的语法。It overrides the method to support methods of the class and overrides the and methods to support the new syntax. 它还提供了`Print`方法，打印出所有字典键和值。It also provides a `Print` method, which prints out all dictionary keys and values. remarks.format: ## Remarks 类派生自类可以重写此方法以指定应如何对动态对象执行将值设置为成员的操作。Classes derived from the class can override this method to specify how operations that set a value to a member should be performed for a dynamic object. 如果该方法没有覆盖，语言运行时联编程序确定的行为。When the method is not overridden, the run-time binder of the language determines the behavior. （大多数情况下，将引发语言特定的运行时异常。）(In most cases, a language-specific run-time exception is thrown.) 当你有这样的语句时调用此方法`sampleObject.SampleProperty = "Test"`，其中`sampleObject`是派生自的类的实例类。This method is called when you have statements like `sampleObject.SampleProperty = "Test"`, where `sampleObject` is an instance of the class that is derived from the class. 此外可以向派生自的类添加你自己的成员`DynamicObject`类。You can also add your own members to classes derived from the `DynamicObject` class. 如果您的类定义属性，而且还将重写方法，动态语言运行时 (DLR) 第一次使用语言联编程序来查找有关静态的类中的属性定义。If your class defines properties and also overrides the method, the dynamic language runtime (DLR) first uses the language binder to look for a static definition of a property in the class. 如果没有这样的属性，DLR 调用方法。If there is no such property, the DLR calls the method. ## Examples 假设你想要提供替代语法访问值在字典中，编写的因此`sampleDictionary["Text"] = "Sample text"`(`sampleDictionary("Text") = "Sample text"`在 Visual Basic 中)，你可以编写`sampleDictionary.Text = "Sample text"`。Assume that you want to provide alternative syntax for accessing values in a dictionary, so that instead of writing `sampleDictionary["Text"] = "Sample text"` (`sampleDictionary("Text") = "Sample text"` in Visual Basic), you can write `sampleDictionary.Text = "Sample text"`. 此外，此语法必须不区分大小写，以便`sampleDictionary.Text`等效于`sampleDictionary.text`。Also, this syntax must be case-insensitive, so that `sampleDictionary.Text` is equivalent to `sampleDictionary.text`. 下面的代码示例演示`DynamicDictionary`类，该类派生自类。The following code example demonstrates the `DynamicDictionary` class, which is derived from the class. `DynamicDictionary`类包含的对象`Dictionary`类型 (`Dictionary(Of String, Object)`在 Visual Basic 中) 来存储键 / 值对，并重写和方法，以支持新的语法。The `DynamicDictionary` class contains an object of the `Dictionary` type (`Dictionary(Of String, Object)` in Visual Basic) to store the key-value pairs, and overrides the and methods to support the new syntax. 它还提供了`Count`属性，用于显示多少动态属性字典包含。It also provides a `Count` property, which shows how many dynamic properties the dictionary contains. remarks.format: ## Remarks 类派生自类可以重写此方法以指定应如何对动态对象执行一元运算。Classes derived from the class can override this method to specify how unary operations should be performed for a dynamic object. 如果该方法没有覆盖，语言运行时联编程序确定的行为。When the method is not overridden, the run-time binder of the language determines the behavior. （大多数情况下，将引发语言特定的运行时异常。）(In most cases, a language-specific run-time exception is thrown.) 使用一元运算，例如求反、 递增，或递减时调用此方法。This method is called when you have unary operations such as negation, increment, or decrement. 例如，如果方法被重写，此方法将自动调用语句等`negativeNumber = -number`，其中`number`派生自类。For example, if the method is overridden, this method is automatically invoked for statements like `negativeNumber = -number`, where `number` is derived from the class. 你可以通过使用来获取有关一元运算的类型信息`Operation`属性`binder`参数。You can get information about the type of the unary operation by using the `Operation` property of the `binder` parameter. 如果仅在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中使用动态对象`binder.Operation`属性可以具有中的以下值之一枚举。If your dynamic object is used only in C# and Visual Basic, the `binder.Operation` property can have one of the following values from the enumeration. 但是，在 IronPython 或 IronRuby 等其他语言，可以有其他值。However, in other languages such as IronPython or IronRuby, you can have other values. |“值”Value|描述Description|C#C#|Visual BasicVisual Basic| |-----------|-----------------|---------|------------------| |`Decrement`|一元递减运算。A unary decrement operation.|`a--`|不支持。Not supported.| |`Increment`|一元递增操作。A unary increment operation.|`a++`|不支持。Not supported.| |`Negate`|算术求反。An arithmetic negation.|`-a`|`-a`| |`Not`|逻辑求反。A logical negation.|`!a`|`Not a`| |`OnesComplement`|的补数。A ones complement.|`~a`|不支持。Not supported.| |`IsFalse`|False 条件的值。A false condition value.|`a && b`|不支持。Not supported.| |`IsTrue`|一个条件为真值。A true condition value.|`a || b`|不支持。Not supported.| |`UnaryPlus`|一元加。A unary plus.|`+a`|`+a`| > [!NOTE] > 若要实现`OrElse`(`a || b`) 和`AndAlso`(`a && b`) 的 C# 中的动态对象操作来说，你可能想要实现方法和方法。To implement `OrElse` (`a || b`) and `AndAlso` (`a && b`) operations for dynamic objects in C#, you may want to implement both the method and the method. > > `OrElse`操作包含一元`IsTrue`操作和二进制`Or`操作。The `OrElse` operation consists of the unary `IsTrue` operation and the binary `Or` operation. `Or`仅当执行操作的结果`IsTrue`操作`false`。The `Or` operation is performed only if the result of the `IsTrue` operation is `false`. > > `AndAlso`操作包含一元`IsFalse`操作和二进制`And`操作。The `AndAlso` operation consists of the unary `IsFalse` operation and the binary `And` operation. `And`仅当执行操作的结果`IsFalse`操作`false`。The `And` operation is performed only if the result of the `IsFalse` operation is `false`. ## Examples 假定您需要数据结构，用于存储文本和数值表示形式的数字，并且你想要定义此类数据算术求反运算。Assume that you need a data structure to store textual and numeric representations of numbers, and you want to define a mathematical negation operation for such data. 下面的代码示例演示`DynamicNumber`类，该类派生自类。The following code example demonstrates the `DynamicNumber` class, which is derived from the class. `DynamicNumber` 重写方法，以使算术求反运算。`DynamicNumber` overrides the method to enable the mathematical negation operation. 它还会覆盖和使对元素的访问的方法。Is also overrides the and methods to enable access to the elements. 在此示例中，支持仅算术求反运算。In this example, only the mathematical negation operation is supported. 如果尝试编写类似的语句`negativeNumber = +number`，则会发生运行时异常。If you try to write a statement like `negativeNumber = +number`, a run-time exception occurs.
